content.prompt: Students perform an experiment with a length of wire in a magnetic field of magnitude B. The wire has a current of magnitude I. The current is toward the right, and the magnetic field is toward the top of the page, as shown in the figure. The students use a force probe to measure the force on the wire and observe that the reading on the probe has a magnitude of F, and the force is directed out of the page. The students double the magnitude and reverse the direction of the current in the wire. Which of the following will the students observe?

choices.label: The reading on the force probe will now be zero.
The force on probe will be F, and the force will be directed out of the page.
The force on probe will be F, and the force will be directed into the page.
The force on probe will be 2F, and the force will be directed out of the page.
The force on probe will be 2F, and the force will be directed into the page.
